articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
John Hartson will be back on stage at Peadar Browns, Dublin on Friday night. Just over a year since his last visit to the venue. So much has happend over the last year at Celtic Park. Ange leaving, Brendan returning and a treble of trophies to admire in the trophy room at Celtic Park from […]
The post Lots to talk about in Dublin … John Hartson appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.
articles.title: Lots to talk about in Dublin … John Hartson
